title: BFF Math Class
description: BFF Math Class is a dress-up game, your task is to assist the girl in getting ready for her math class. You'll need to prepare her bag and create the perfect look. There's a wide selection of hairstyles, outfits, and accessories to choose from, allowing you to create a fashionable and stylish appearance for her. Your goal is to make sure she looks cool at school by selecting the trendiest outfits available. Additionally, you'll need to help her complete all her math exercises, combining your fashion stylist skills with some math problem-solving to ensure she's fully prepared for class. Enjoy the game and have fun dressing up the character while sharpening your math skills!
